title: Hmm...
content:
Depends on what mood I'm in. Generally anything that has some kind of power behind it, whether in its lyrics, melody or just the beat beneath everything. Other times I prefer slow, instrumental music. Techno/rock ballads I'd say would come out on top most of the time, but it's hard to determine--there's so much awesome stuff out there and music is such a subjective experience.

I'm not really too fond of the alternative and hiphop scenes at the moment. There's just something about them that grates against me... maybe something to do with the rhythm not synchronising with the melody... they just seem disjointed... or something. There isn't much feeling to them. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

title: Favourite type of music...
content:
I'm gonna say rock. But, you know, there's lots of different stuff I like... mostly I don't like chart stuff, you know, top 40 and all that. I like weird music like Henry Cow and suchforth. Also other stuff. I like different music for different reasons... creativity, emotionality... thet's not a word. Boy can I ramble on forever. Sorry.------------------
Nothing in particular
